brand.logo_usage: Use the monochrome wordmark on dark panels. Accent lozenges may sit behind it if opacity < 12%.

influences: Enterprise analytics systems with layered dashboards

tone.voice: Measured operator with a product-case-study bias
avoid: body text about inspiration or dreams
sentence_rules: State the outcome first, then mention the subsystem enabling it.
Tie every feature to a concrete workflow (e.g., review → customize → deploy).
Reference artifacts (dashboards, brand system, timeline) so the page feels like a case-study recap.

depth.surface_finish: Matte dark panels with thin border separators

motion.usage: Only animate hero panel offsets and hover lifts; keep text and CTA static.

screenshot_rules: Use real UI captures with believable data, never abstract gradients.
Layer at least two panels with 12px offset and drop shadow.
Include one brand-guideline strip showing palette + typography tokens.
imagery.texture_usage: Subtle diagonal noise at <8% opacity allowed on hero background.

primary.style: Solid accent_primary with 2px outline on dark surfaces

secondary.style: Surface_muted background, 1px card_border, text in accent_secondary

tertiary.style: Link style with underline on hover
tertiary.usage: Download resources or jump to docs

panels.shadow: use l2 token on back layers, l1 on front
panels.annotations: Use accent_secondary lines to connect metrics to text

nav.style: Sticky top case-study rail with anchor links
nav.cta: Single outline button linking to downloads

brand_strip.type_sample: Space Grotesk uppercase sample + Inter paragraph

hero.left: Headline, supporting copy, CTA pair, secondary metrics row
hero.right: Stacked UI panels with annotation tags

ui_panels.description: Primary layered dashboard rendering for hero

full_page_preview.description: Full page screenshot displayed like a framed poster

full-preview.treatment: framed poster with caption + download note

control.color_story: Use accent_primary for hero CTA, accent_secondary for metrics annotations.
notes: Hero headline should read like a case-study title (Outcome + Team).
Always mention analytics + download gating inside the features grid.

variant-a.color_story: Shift focus to surface_alt backgrounds with green success badges.
notes: Swap CTA order to emphasize assets first.
Use quotes from cohort leads in testimonials.

usage_notes: Backgrounds stay in the charcoal family; accents only appear on CTA, metrics tags, or timeline markers.
Each major section needs at least one real artifact (screenshot, palette strip, wireframe) instead of abstract blobs.
Alternate dense UI clusters with generous breathing room so the cadence feels editorial rather than template-driven.
Keep CTA buttons pill-shaped and avoid gradient fills—solid colors with precise shadows only.
Surface_alt sections should include subtle texture or print-like dividers to sell the case-study vibe.
